title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: A second opinion on a thorny issue might prove beneficial today. Perhaps a colleague or expert claims more authority than they should. Avoid the stress of arguing with them, especially if the problem is outside your expertise. Seek to learn rather than putting your ego on the line. If it turns out this persons initial assertions are accurate, there is good reason to trust them. But if they made an error in judgment, you can still step in and save the day. Its not about right versus wrong; its about getting the job done well. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
